amendment.description: To provide for the establishment of free market enterprise zones in order to help facilitate the creation of new jobs, entrepreneurial opportunities, enhanced and renewed educational opportunities, and increased community involvement in bankrupt or economically distressed areas.

action.text: Amendment SA 3787 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discpline with respect to amendment SA 3787 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 33 - 64. Record Vote Number: 53.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 311(a) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 3787.

Amendment SA 3787 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 2953. (consideration: CR S2161, S2190-2191) To provide for the establishment of free market enterprise zones in order to help facilitate the creation of new jobs, entrepreneurial opportunities, enhanced and renewed educational opportunities, and increased community involvement in bankrupt or economically distressed areas.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discpline with respect to amendment SA 3787 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 33 - 64. Record Vote Number: 53.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3787 proposed by Senator Paul to Amendment SA 2953.
